meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1623.

td.p: Mark Abramson, a data specialist from Encino, California
Lance Coon, a teacher from Phoenix, Arizona
Seth Davis, an environmental lawyer from Croton-on-Hudson, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $39,000)

tr.td: U.S. STATES
BIBLICAL QUOTES
FASHION
SPORTS HISTORY
NAMES THAT ARE VERBS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '1 newspaper announced her pregnancy with: "Monaco weather forecast: A little Rainier in February"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: 1 newspaper announced her pregnancy with: "Monaco weather forecast: A little Rainier in February"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', '(Seth: What is a cuff?)

(Alex: Mmmm...[Looks at judges] Can we accept that? No, I don\'t think so. Lance?)

(Lance: What is a [*]?)

(Alex: Yes, the clue pertained to the whole [*], not just to the cuff. Lance, back to you.}

sleeve

SethLance
')
